name: Aa'une the Oligarch, Projection / Aa'une the Oligarch, Avatar
effect: Aa'une the Oligarch starts the game and comes into play with this side face-up.

(Minions use Brainwashed text. Minions may only play Generic Mugic.)

C:200 P:200 W:200 S:200
Discard a Mugic Card: Your opponent sacrifices a Creature.
(Minions use Brainwashed text. Minions may only play Generic Mugic.)
The source of all nightmares is here. The end of Perim is now.

name: Aer'dak
effect: 3MC: Deal 20 damage to target Creature with Swift.
10MC: Destroy all opposing Creatures with Range.

name: Aftermath Feint
effect: If your engaged Creature is defeated this turn, draw two Attack Cards and discard two Attack Cards.

name: Agrino Jaldar
effect: Hive: Agrino Jaldar has an additional 5 Energy for each Danian you control.
Agrino Jaldar deals an additional 5 damage to Minions.
Agrino Jaldar deals an additional 5 damage to Infected Creatures.

name: Aivenna
effect: While you control a Muge, Aivenna has "Support All Disciplines 5."

name: Anger'keem
effect: Fluidmorph (When a Creature you control deals Water damage, this Creature gains a Mugic counter.)

name: Appelai
effect: Reduce Recklessness damage dealt to Warbeasts you control by 10 for each Mugic counter on Appelai.
When a Warbeast you control becomes the target of a Mugic or ability your opponent controls, Appelai gains a Mugic counter.

name: Arrthoa
effect: While an opposing Creature has Water, Arrthoa has "Range" and "Swift 1."

name: Attacat, Tactical Aide
effect: 1MC: Heal 10 damage to target adjacent OverWorld Creature.

name: Aureban
effect: Hive: Aureban has an additional 10 Energy for each Infected Creature your opponent controls.

name: Bahrakatan, The Coralsmith
effect: Battlegear cannot be destroyed by Mugic or abilities. (Battlegear may still be sacrificed or flipped face‐down.)
Once Bahrakatan forged the shards, Aa'une knew that success was guaranteed.

name: Biakan
effect: If an opponent would reveal a new active Location on your turn, instead you reveal a new active Location.

name: Blaaxa
effect: Reveal an Attack Card from your hand: Target Attack with the same name as the revealed card deals 0 damage.

name: Calling of Aa'une
effect: If Aa'une the Oligarch, Projection won combat this turn while equipped with Baton of Aa'une and you played Rage of Aa'une this turn, flip over Aa'une the Oligarch, Projection.

name: Curemorph Chords
effect: It was hardly fair. As their mortal wounds instantly healed, the irresistible force became even more unstoppable.

name: Decelerating Requiem
effect: As his pulse plummeted, his heart beat slower... slower... and fell silent.

name: Denial Refrain of the Deep
effect: When Bodal realized that only four of his seven notes played, he calculated that he only had 2.5 seconds until Erak'tabb's tentacle squished him like an overripe djobwon.

name: Dhilas
effect: Hive: Danian Mugic you play which deals damage deals an additional 5 damage.

name: Dractyl Scales
effect: Sacrifice Dractyl Scales: Equipped Creature gains 10 Energy and target Creature loses 10 in all Disciplines. If Dractyl Scales was equipped to H'earring, equipped Creature gains an additional 10 Energy.

name: Dror'niq
effect: 1MC: The next time Dror'niq is dealt attack damage, deal 10 damage to the Creature which played that attack.
4MC: When target Creature is dealt attack damage, deal 10 damage to the Creature which played that attack.

name: Electric Rain
effect: The opposing engaged Creature must pay an additional Mugic counter to play abilities which cost one or more Mugic counters.

name: Epitrinne
effect: Damage which would be dealt to Epitrinne by Mugic is reduced to 0.

name: Fal'makin
effect: Discard 2 Mugic Cards: Destroy target engaged Creature with 0 Wisdom.
(Minions use Brainwashed text. Minions may only play Generic Mugic.)

name: Fire Stream
effect: If the opposing engaged Creature is equipped, damage dealt by Fire Stream is reduced to 0.

name: Fla'gamp
effect: 1MC: Look at the top card of target player's Location Deck.
1MC: Put the top card of target player's Location Deck on the bottom of that deck.
2MC: Your opponent reveals a new active Location.

name: Fliandar
effect: Uninfect 3 Infected Creatures: Activate Hive and heal all damage on Fliandar.

name: Fluidmight
effect: When a Fluidmorpher deals damage with Fluidmight, it gains a Mugic counter.

name: Force Balls
effect: If you control non‐OverWorld Creatures, damage dealt by Force Balls is reduced to 0.

name: Frozen Fire
effect: When a Creature gains or removes a Mugic counter, Frozen Fire deals 5 damage to it.
The ocean of flames chills as it burns.

name: Gimwei
effect: When Gimwei is dealt 20 or more damage from a single source, deal 5 damage to target Creature.
When Gimwei deals 20 or more damage with a single attack, it gains 20 to all Disciplines.

name: Glost
effect: Glost has an additional 5 Energy, "Earth 5", and "Air 5" for each Conjuror in your discard pile.
If more Warbeasts are our only hope for survival, I fear for our future!

name: H'earring, Tainted
effect: At the beginning of combat, look at your opponent's attack hand and choose an Attack Card. They discard it and then draw an Attack Card.

name: Harmonies of the Wind
effect: Target M'arrillian or Minion cannot move or play activated abilities.
When Perim is at its darkest, the Cothica lights the path of hope.

name: Headmaster Ankhyja
effect: Invisibility abilities work against Creatures with Invisibility.
If you lost Initiative, your engaged Creature gains "Strike 10." (Creatures with Strike 10 deal an additional 10 damage with the first attack they make each combat.)

name: Hune Paltanin
effect: When a Mugic counter is removed from an opposing non‐OverWorld Creature, heal 10 damage to target Creature.
She is rarely seen outside the Library, but Maxxor needs all the help he can get.

name: Ikub'ra
effect: Ikub'ra deals an additional 5 attack damage to OverWorld Creatures.
"So there IS someone who despises OverWorlders more than me!"

name: Intress' Healing Ballad
effect: Heal 5 damage to target engaged Creature for each Mugic counter on opposing Creatures. (You check the number of Mugic counters when this Mugic resolves.)

name: Invader's Tactics
effect: If your opponent controls the active Location, deal an additional 5 damage.

name: Jus'hebban
effect: Attacks played by Creatures you control have "Challenge Speed 50: Deal 10 damage."
(Minions use Brainwashed text. Minions may only play Generic Mugic.)

name: Kha'rall Amber Shard
effect: Equipped Kha'rall has an additional 25 Energy and "Defender: Minion."

name: Kha'rall Chime Shard
effect: Equipped Kha'rall has an additional 25 Energy and "Defender: Kha'rall."

name: Kha'rall Crush
effect: If your engaged Creature is equipped with a Shard, deal an additional 10 damage.

name: Kha'rall Freshwater Shard
effect: Equipped Kha'rall has an additional 25 Energy and "Defender: Fluidmorpher."

name: Kha'rall Magma Shard
effect: Equipped Kha'rall has an additional 25 Energy and "Defender: Chieftain."

name: Kha'rall Shard of the Tidal Crest
effect: At the beginning of combat, if there are 8 or more Mugic counters among Creatures you control, equipped Kha'rall gains 40 Energy.

name: Khybon, The Renegade
effect: At the beginning of combat, if Khybon is equipped, it gains 10 Energy.

name: Kiru City Tunnels
effect: Creatures with 35 or more Scanned Energy deal 10 less attack damage.
When any player shuffles their Attack Deck, that player reveals a new active Location.

name: Kopond's Composition
effect: Deal 5 damage to target engaged Creature for each Mugic counter on opposing Creatures. (You check the number of Mugic counters when this Mugic resolves.)

name: Lam'inkal
effect: Fluidmorph (When a Creature you control deals Water damage, this Creature gains a Mugic counter.)
Learn to wield water as a weapon and you'll find that you are never unarmed.

name: Liquid Thought Evaporator
effect: Attacks played by equipped Creature also count as Water attacks.
When Liquid Thought Evaporator is flipped face-down, equipped Fluidmorpher gains a Mugic counter.

name: Marksman's Preparation
effect: The opposing engaged Creature cannot gain Mugic counters.
You may discard another card named Marksman's Preparation. If you do, deal an additional 30 damage and draw an Attack Card.

name: Mightsingers Requiem
effect: When a pebble becomes as heavy as a boulder, your life will soon be over.

name: Mightswing
effect: If you control non‐UnderWorld Creatures, damage dealt by Mightswing is reduced to 0.

name: Mik'banin
effect: Mik'banin deals an additional 5 attack damage to UnderWorld Creatures.
The strategy was obvious but efficient: invade, subjugate, annihilate.

name: Mindproof March
effect: Heal 5 damage to target Creature and deal 5 damage to another target Creature for each Danian you control with Water.

name: Mock'adyn
effect: 4MC: Heal 25 damage to all Creatures you control.

name: Najarin, Fluidmorphers' Foe
effect: When an opposing Creature not named Najarin gains a Mugic counter, Najarin gains a Mugic counter.

name: Nivenna
effect: 1MC: Choose an Elemental Type. Target Creature which dealt attack damage this turn gains "Element 10" of the chosen Elemental Type. Use this ability only once per turn.
Warriors you control have an additional 10 to all Disciplines.

name: Nunk'worn
effect: Attacks played by Nunk'worn also count as Fire and Water attacks.
If Nunk'worn has exactly 3 Mugic counters on it when it is defeated, you may return it to play in an open space on your side of the Battleboard with no Mugic counters.

name: Petrifying Power
effect: If your opponent controls the active Location, damage dealt by Petrifying Power is reduced to 0.

name: Phelphor, of the Deep
effect: 1MC: Relocate target opposing unengaged Creature into an unoccupied space adjacent to it.
4MC: Creatures lose Swift and may not move or relocate into unoccupied spaces.

name: Phobia Plates
effect: Creatures engaged with equipped Creature fail all Challenges on attacks they play.
Equipped Creature takes 10 less damage from Mugic.

name: Poison Steam
effect: If you have fewer Mugic Cards in your hand than your opponent, damage dealt by Poison Steam is reduced to 0.

name: Psi-fanger's Shelf
effect: When an Attack Card would be placed in an Attack Discard pile, instead place it on the bottom of its owner's Attack Deck.
When a player would draw an Attack Card, instead they return an Attack Card in their Attack Discard pile to their hand.
If any Attack Discard pile is empty, reveal a new active Location.

name: Rage of Aa'une
effect: If your engaged Creature is a Chieftain, deal an additional 10 damage.

name: Rancorous Projection
effect: For each Discipline over 50 the opposing engaged Creature has, damage dealt by Rancorous Projection is reduced by 10.

name: Requiem of Fear
effect: There is no need to fight if your foe is in flight!

name: Requiem of Lost Minds
effect: A word to the wise: the wise need no words.

name: Ri'oha
effect: 2MC: Swap the Battlegear equipped to two target Kha'rall Creatures controlled by the same player.
4MC: Return target Shard in your discard pile to play equipped to an unequipped Kha'rall you control.

name: Rol'doi
effect: Rol'doi deals an additional 5 attack damage to Danian Creatures.
As the waves crash in his wake, his claws slash through you!

name: Royal Mipedian Academy of Melee Arts
effect: Mirage: Creatures in this space may not be the target of Mugic.
Trust not blades, for they break. Trust not shields, for they shatter. Trust only yourself, who can neither break nor shatter.

name: Sandstrike
effect: If you control non‐Mipedian Creatures, damage dealt by Sandstrike is reduced to 0.

name: Siril'ean's Lair
effect: At the beginning of combat, if a player has fewer Mugic Cards in hand than the number of Creatures they control, that player discards a Mugic Card.

name: Siril'ean, The Songthief
effect: 5MC: Play a Mugic Card of any tribe in your opponent's discard pile without paying its Mugic cost. Then remove that Mugic Card from the game.

name: Skeletal Springs
effect: Fluidmorphers cannot gain Mugic counters or use Mugic counters to pay for Mugic or abilities.

name: Solar Flare
effect: Remove X Mugic counters from the opposing engaged Creature, where X is the number of Mugic counters on your engaged Creature.

name: Stelgar
effect: When Stelgar deals attack damage, it gains 10 to all Disciplines.
If Stelgar has more than 125 Power, destroy it.
If Stelgar has 2 or more Mugic counters on it, destroy it.

name: Supercooled Rain
effect: Your opponent removes a total of 4 Mugic counters from among any Creatures they control.

name: Swarming Destruction
effect: If you control non‐Danian Creatures, damage dealt by Swarming Destruction is reduced to 0.

name: Taffial
effect: Attacks played by Creatures you control deal an additional 5 damage if there is an Attack Card with the same name in your Attack Discard pile.

name: Tainted Thunderstorm
effect: Challenge Mugic counters 1: Deal 20 damage (If your engaged Creature has at least one more Mugic Counter than the opposing engaged Creature, deal 20 damage.)

name: Takinom, The Shadowknight
effect: Strike 10 (This Creature deals an additional 10 damage with its first attack each combat.)
1MC: The next attack made by Takinom counts as its first attack this combat.

name: Tarbok
effect: "My only fear is that I have no fear."

name: Tasqa
effect: 1MC: Deal 15 damage to target adjacent equipped Creature.
Never attack a fully-armored Drill Dozer head-on when you can simply remove one screw to disable its systems.

name: The Coralsmithy
effect: When a Creature plays an attack that has both Fire and Water, its controller may swap that Creature's Battlegear with any Battlegear in its controller's discard pile.

name: The Oligarch's Path
effect: Calling of Aa'une costs 4 less Mugic counters to play.
Najarin's visions were getting more disturbing. How could the worst be still to come?!?

name: The Rao'Pa Sahkk Chimegrid
effect: When The Rao'Pa Sahkk Chimegrid becomes the active Location, each player places a Mugic counter on a Creature they control.
The sound reverberated far and wide - the Song of Doom!

name: The Training Grounds
effect: At the beginning of combat, The Training Grounds deals 5 damage to each engaged Creature for each Mugic counter on that Creature.
When a Creature wins combat, that Creature gains Mugic counters equal to its Mugic Ability.

name: Tidal Surge
effect: If the opposing engaged Creature has any Mugic counters, damage dealt by Tidal Surge is reduced to 0.

name: Unheard Melody
effect: Destroy target Creature with no Mugic counters.
Who knows why Mugicians exist. Just be thankful they do.

name: Vexing Waveform
effect: When you play Vexing Waveform you may pay an additional 2 Mugic counters. If you do, the target Creature gains an additional "Recklessness 5."

name: Vial of Liquid Thought
effect: Sacrifice Vial of Liquid Thought: Return an Attack Card from your Attack Discard pile to your hand. If you do, place one Attack Card from your hand on the bottom of your Attack Deck.

name: Vitar'zu
effect: Vitar'zu deals an additional 5 attack damage to Mipedian Creatures.
The Stalkers remained invisible. Now they were the ones being stalked.

name: Wamma, Hive Ordnance
effect: When a Mandiblor comes into play from a discard pile, Wamma gains a Mugic counter.
Battlegear equipped to Infected Creatures is not flipped face-up when those Creatures become engaged.
